author: James T. Areddy
title: Anbang’s Rescue Is China’s Too-Big-to-Fail Moment
text:
SHANGHAI—A Chinese government takeover of Anbang Insurance Group Co. throws a lifeline to its policyholders—support denied to frustrated clients of some lesser-known financial firms when those companies hit turbulence before ultimately collapsing.
The China Insurance Regulatory Commission said Friday that a team of financial regulators would manage Anbang for at least a year. It justified the action in the second sentence of a public notice: “to protect the legitimate rights and interests of consumers and safeguard public...
